invite.EXEC: this.say('Would you like to play Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?')
invite.affirm: this.say('Awesome! Then let us begin.'); this.changeState('next-question')
invite.reject: this.say('Too bad. Maybe next time then.'); this.changeState('goodbye')
invite.DEFAULT: this.say("I'm sorry. I don't quite understand your answer. Was that a yes?")

next-question.DEFAULT: this.say('Let me process what you just said.')

seek-confirmation.affirm: this.say('Let us check the answer then.'); this.changeState('lock-answer')
seek-confirmation.reject: this.say("I'll give you more time"); this.changeState('repeat-question')
seek-confirmation.DEFAULT: this.say('Let me process what you just said.')
